Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Industrial Product/Industrial Aid/Pharmaceutical Excipient/Surfactant Excipient/Thonzonium Bromide
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A cationic surface-active compound. As an additive to pharmacologic formulations, thonzonium bromide causes dispersion and penetration of cellular debris and exudate, thereby promoting tissue contact of the administered medication.
